name: Pack Attack

sections.body: When you are adjacent to an ally with this feat, the first time you melee attack an opponent, you can spend an immediate action to take a 5-foot step, even if you have otherwise moved this round.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can take a 5-foot step only if you have not otherwise moved in a round.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are skilled at surrounding your enemies.
